meal.name: Extra
meal.introduction: Food is not enough? How about some more!

meal.name: Kweichow Moutai
meal.introduction: Drink too light? Have some good wine!

meal.name: Baguette
meal.introduction: Still hungry? Let's have some food to appease our hunger!

meal.name: Russian caviar
meal.introduction: Fresh Russian food. You're sure you don't want some?

meal.name: Spanish ham
meal.introduction: Ham from the court, delicious from the master.

meal.name: Rice
meal.introduction: Eat benefit convenient rice, be healthy citizen!

meal.name: Hamburger
meal.introduction: You're next in line for eating!

meal.name: French fries
meal.introduction: Food is limitless, and young people dare to be fresh.

meal.name: Mousse Cake
meal.introduction: Taste in the mouth, sweet in the heart.

meal.name: Cookies
meal.introduction: Good cookies bring you good luck.

meal.name: Chocolate
meal.introduction: Crispy between the teeth, drunk in the heart.

meal.name: Taro Pie
meal.introduction: Crispy crust with fragrant taro, tasty and memorable

meal.name: Candy Floss
meal.introduction: Experience cloud-like silkiness on the clouds.
